bio: An Optimism glossary, a directory of Optimism tools and resources, and more
contributionDescription:
- Launched an Optimism-specific glossary to make it easier for users to look up terms they’re unfamiliar with (What is a Special Voting Cycle? What are Intents?)
- Launched a directory providing an overview of tools and (educational) resources relevant to Optimism, ranging from tutorials, conference talks, podcasts, blog posts to analytics dashboards.
- Built an experimental RetroPGF micro lesson that reduces the time it takes to get an in-depth understanding of the mechanisms and vision behind Retroactive Public Goods Funding
impactDescription:
- Helped many governance participants and end users quickly find an explanation for specific terms like “Reflection Period”, “RetroPGF Flywheel”, “Superchain”
- Improved the visibility of many great tools and resources
- The contribute form on the website was used by organizations such as the USC Blockchain Club to submit links to resources
- Reached a total of 1.38k unique website visitors, and 2.6k total pageviews
- 230 unique outbound link clicks to community resources
- 36 successfully completed micro lessons

fundingSources.description: No revenue was generated and no grants were received

pwCategorySuggestions: Developer Ecosystem, Blockchain Education, Governance & Tokens
